properties.name: uboat.pretty-print-logs
properties.description: Set to true if the app should print objects formatted with spaces and multiple lines.

properties.name: uboat.max-active-seconds
properties.description: Describes how many seconds are allowed by an sailor to not give any update of his position(pulse) for clients to request a journey to him.

properties.name: uboat.max-active-sailors
properties.description: Describes how many sailors can be retrieved when requesting a new journey. The closest [max-active-sailors] will be retrieved.

properties.name: uboat.apis-body-not-logged
properties.description: List of APIs for which the body will not be logged. Most useful when APIs return bytes.

properties.name: uboat.hs256_key
properties.description: Private key used in the creation of JWT.

properties.name: whitelist
properties.description: List of ant patterns that don't require authorization header.

properties.name: client-blacklist
properties.description: List of ant patterns for which the UBoat Client does not have access.

properties.name: sailor-blacklist
properties.description: List of ant patterns for which the UBoat Sailor does not have access.
